snippet: They are joining with Participant Media, Reliance Entertainment and Entertainment One in creating Amblin Partners, to produce movies, TV shows and digital content.
abstract: Steven Spielberg says he and his DreamWorks Studios will join Participant Media, Reliance Entertainment and Entertainment One to create firm called Amblin Partners; group will produce movies, television programs and digital content.
lead_paragraph: They are joining with Participant Media, Reliance Entertainment and Entertainment One in creating Amblin Partners, to produce movies, TV shows and digital content.

headline.main: Steven Spielberg and DreamWorks Studios in Deal to Form New Company
headline.print_headline: Spielberg and DreamWorks Join Others to Form Film, Television and Digital Production Company
